txt.en: You show your enemy no mercy, striking where it hurts most, reducing armour and inflicting bleed damage.

#1:[placeholder]: While utilizing the Red Dawn Discipline the following skills will greatly reduce enemy armour and inflict heavy bleed damage when a critical hit is landed: #1:{None|Ride By, Keen Strike[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Bond of the Rider[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Dirge, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Flame, Oration of Embers, Resolution of Fire[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]|Execute, Biting Edge[B]| Momentous Hit[R]|Quick Strike[O]}
